name: Eric-ha
tagline: a personal website for Eice ha
body:
### Welcome to Eric's Website.
This page is a description of my personal and professional projects!

### Water Chlorine sensor
A device contracted by water missions international that uses solar power to control a self sustaining chlorine sensor for deployment in rural areas where where water toxicity is a problem.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the page? ask for help from our page moderator at p.tomas14@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
